short_summary: inspection, maintenance and repair services for the in-service Emergency Breathing System
description: The proposed work must fully comply with the Technical Requirements within the Request for Proposal solicitation document.
full_summary:
Emergency Breathing System In-Service Support
====================================================================

**Reference Number**: #PW-22-01007332
**Amendment Number**: 0
**Solicitation Number**: W6399-23LK64/B
**Publication Date**: September 15, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: October 18, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT

**Background**
------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bid proposals for in-service support of the Emergency Breathing System (EBS). The successful bidder will be responsible for providing inspection, maintenance, and repair services for EBS.

**Requirement Description**
-------------------------

The requirement involves providing EBS inspection, maintenance, and repair services to meet the Technical Requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal solicitation document. The proposed work must fully comply with the Technical Requirements.

**Bidding Requirements**
----------------------

Bid proposals must be submitted electronically by October 18, 2022, at 2:00 PM EDT. Bid proposals must only be submitted to Megan Buchanan (Megan.Buchanan@forces.gc.ca).

**Notice Information**
-------------------

*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
*   Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
*   Contracting Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
*   Contact Information: Megan Buchanan (megan.buchanan@forces.gc.ca, 613-945-2929)

**Supporting Documents**
----------------------

The supporting documents for this procurement include:

*   English RFP Document: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/15/5875aead7d56a647ae8423b3d337b6e5/w6399-23lk64_b_english_rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/15/5875aead7d56a647ae8423b3d337b6e5/w6399-23lk64_b_english_rfp.pdf)
*   French RFP Document: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/15/f5272dd766be6825b2ca3e39629d8ce1/w
